name: v1.28.0
body:
## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 6:

Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:
```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "aspect_rules_js", version = "1.28.0")

####### Node.js version #########
# By default you get the node version from DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION in @rules_nodejs//nodejs:repositories.bzl
# Optionally you can pin a different node version:
bazel_dep(name = "rules_nodejs", version = "5.8.2")
node = use_extension("@rules_nodejs//nodejs:extensions.bzl", "node")
node.toolchain(node_version = "16.14.2")
#################################

npm = use_extension("@aspect_rules_js//npm:extensions.bzl", "npm", dev_dependency = True)

npm.npm_translate_lock(
    name = "npm",
    pnpm_lock = "//:pnpm-lock.yaml",
    verify_node_modules_ignored = "//:.bazelignore",
)

use_repo(npm, "npm")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "aspect_rules_js",
    sha256 = "2a88d837f8fb7bfe46b1d9f413df9a777ec2973e1f812929b597c1971a3a1da5",
    strip_prefix = "rules_js-1.28.0",
    url = "https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/releases/download/v1.28.0/rules_js-v1.28.0.tar.gz",
)

load("@aspect_rules_js//js:repositories.bzl", "rules_js_dependencies")

rules_js_dependencies()

load("@rules_nodejs//nodejs:repositories.bzl", "DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION", "nodejs_register_toolchains")

nodejs_register_toolchains(
    name = "nodejs",
    node_version = DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION,
)

load("@aspect_rules_js//npm:repositories.bzl", "npm_translate_lock")

npm_translate_lock(
    name = "npm",
    pnpm_lock = "//:pnpm-lock.yaml",
    verify_node_modules_ignored = "//:.bazelignore",
)

load("@npm//:repositories.bzl", "npm_repositories")

npm_repositories()
```


## What's Changed
* docs: list js_binary log_level values by @jbedard in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/1091
* feat: add PATH logging to js_binary debug logs by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/1096
* chore: add verify_node_modules_ignored to bzlmod release snippet by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/1097
* ci: enable buildifier check on ci by @jbedard in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/1107
* ci: enable testing on bazel 7 by @jbedard in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/1104
* fix: support node fs operations with URL file paths by @jbedard in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/1106
* fix: multiple versions of a package using aliases in pnpm workspaces crashes by @jbedard in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/1108


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/compare/v1.27.1...v1.28.0

* docs: improve documentation around verify_patches by @Aghassi in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/1050
* chore(deps): update dependency aspect_bazel_lib to v1.31.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/1047
* fix: when symlinking node_modules symlinks in js_run_devserer, prefer the bazel-out copy instead of the runfiles copy if it exists by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/1043
* chore(deps): update webfactory/ssh-agent action to v0.8.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/1003
* docs: note on how to customize the patches directory by @Aghassi in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/1051
* fix: improve error message for invalid js_library(data) files by @jbedard in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/1054
* feat: support custom nodejs toolchains by @jbedard in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/1053

## What's Changed
* chore: fix spacing of js_library docstrings by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/961
* docs: fixup out-of-date docs on generated bzl_library targets within npm_translate_lock external repository by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/962
* chore: re-pin lifecycle-hooks lock file to resolve dependabot alert by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/966
* chore: re-pin e2e/npm_translate_yarn_lock lock file to resolve dependabot alert by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/968
* chore: remove Bazel 5.1.1 from CI matrix since to reduce CI queue times by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/970
* chore: re-pin e2e/npm_translate_package_lock lock file to resolve dependabot alert by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/967
* chore: update examples/webpack_cli/package.json versions to resolve dependabot alert by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/969
* chore(deps): update com_github_ash2k_bazel_tools digest to 2add5bb by @renovate in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/963
* feat: support pnpm lockfile version 6.0 which is generated by pnpm 8 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/973
* docs: add missing word by @troycarlson in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/974
* docs: spelling subtitutions -> substitutions by @mattem in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/980
* chore(deps): update dependency aspect_bazel_lib to v1.30.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/981
* refactor: split node-patches to main (bazel 6 with unresolved symlinks) and legacy (bazel 5 or no unresolved symlinks) by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/984
* refactor: removed unused is_windows params by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/986
* perf: optimize fs patches when using Bazel 6 with unresolved symlinks by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/985
* chore(deps): update dependency aspect_bazel_lib to v1.30.2 by @renovate in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/983
* fix: handle optional deps & prevent long file names in pnpm lockfile v6 used by pnpm 8 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/989
* fix: patchedDependencies works on sub dir and add e2e test by @hunshcn in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/976

## New Contributors

name: v1.20.1
body:
For bzlmod users: this release upgrades rules_nodejs [from 5.8.0 to 5.8.2](https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/compare/5.8.0...5.8.2). That changes the default version of node used. We always recommend registering an explicit nodejs toolchain with a version you pin to, to avoid surprises when our default is upgraded.

## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 6:

Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:
```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "aspect_rules_js", version = "1.20.1")

npm = use_extension("@aspect_rules_js//npm:extensions.bzl", "npm", dev_dependency = True)

npm.npm_translate_lock(
    name = "npm",
    pnpm_lock = "//:pnpm-lock.yaml",
)

use_repo(npm, "npm")
```

```starlark
load("@rules_nodejs//nodejs:repositories.bzl", "DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION", "nodejs_register_toolchains")

nodejs_register_toolchains(
    name = "nodejs",
    node_version = DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION,
)

load("@aspect_rules_js//npm:npm_import.bzl", "npm_translate_lock")

npm_translate_lock(
    name = "npm",
    pnpm_lock = "//:pnpm-lock.yaml",
    verify_node_modules_ignored = "//:.bazelignore",
)

load("@npm//:repositories.bzl", "npm_repositories")

npm_repositories()
```


## What's Changed
* chore: upgrade skylib to v1.4.1 by @kormide in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/892

name: v1.17.0
body:
The `pnpm.patchedDependencies` feature introduced a subtle unintentional breaking change in the following downstream rule sets when used together with this release: rules_jasmine, rules_jest, rules_terser, rules_rollup & rules_webpack.

If you see a failure that looks like the following after upgrading:
```
Error in read: java.io.FileNotFoundException: /private/var/tmp/_bazel/63ad99ef647ce0f24388f2bb28b31b43/external/aspect_rules_webpack/webpack/private/v5.73.0/package.json (No such file or directory)
```
You can resolve by upgrading to the following minimum versions:
- rules_jasmine: https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jasmine/releases/tag/v0.3.0
- rules_jest: https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jest/releases/tag/v0.15.0
- rules_terser: https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_terser/releases/tag/v0.13.0
- rules_rollup: https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_rollup/releases/tag/v0.13.0
- rules_webpack: https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_webpack/releases/tag/v0.8.0

## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 6:

Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:
```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "aspect_rules_js", version = "1.17.0")

npm = use_extension("@aspect_rules_js//npm:extensions.bzl", "npm", dev_dependency = True)

npm.npm_translate_lock(
    name = "npm",
    pnpm_lock = "//:pnpm-lock.yaml",
)

use_repo(npm, "npm")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "aspect_rules_js",
```

* Set fs._unpatched when patching the 'node:fs' module by @gonzojive in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/793

* fix(deps): update patch updates by @renovate in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/782
* chore(deps): update @types by @renovate in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/783

* chore: fix typo in docs by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/794
* chore: update to Aspect CLI 5.1.2 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/795

* feat: support npm_package_lock and preupdate in bzlmod by @kormide in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/798
* feat: improve performance of npm linking & npm_package with hardlinks by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/789
* feat: support bins attr in bzlmod by @kormide in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/800
* fix: improve performance of npm_package with removal of .to_list() on additional_files by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/pull/761
